Do not let a misspelling or grammatical error slip into your images. Proofread your copy through programs like Grammarly or have it checked by at least 2 or more people before uploading.

Text:
Replying to 
@ryanlcooper
Embedded_text: Word is better than Google Doc for format, but understand that computer geeks are not English majors. No program is going to tag every grammar or mechanic error (e. g., comma errors, spelling, etc.), and some tag false errors. I've had many students say, "But I used Grammarly!"

It's moot, btw, not mute. 

A moot point is a fact that doesn't matter because it's not relevant to the current situation. There is no such phrase as mute point; it's an error.

http://grammarly.com ‚Ä∫ blog ‚Ä∫ moot...
